modName: Lykaia - Female Nord Werewolf - RaceMenu Preset
summary: Check this out and tell me how it works
descriptionHtml:
[quote]I want to create Lykaia standalone follower, but i need someone to help me with it. I saw some tutorials but they all seem to be black magic for me. If You have time and knowledge to help, please PM me.

Love,
Sho[/quote]
[b][size=6][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/ggQ3j1n.png[/img][/center]
[/size][/b][b]

[/b]
[size=3][b][u] This is a jslot file for RaceMenu.[/u][/b]



[u][color=#3c78d8]IN[/color][color=#6d9eeb]ST[/color][color=#a4c2f4]AL[/color][color=#c9daf8]LA[/color][color=#cfe2f3]TI[/color][color=#9fc5e8]ON[/color][color=#6fa8dc]:
[/color][/u]
[/size][list][*][size=3]Use NMM, or[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]simply throw it into Skyrim\Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets folder [img]http://i.imgur.com/fSwjQuw.gif[/img]
[/size][/*]
[/list][size=3]

[/size][size=3][color=#f1c232]
PLEASE KEEP IN MIND THAT I USE A SPECIFIC SET OF TEXTURES AND NORMALMAPS. WHEN I GOT PERMISSION I WILL POST THIS SETTINGS HERE :) So... in Your game results may vary.[/color]

Contact me if You have any troubles or suggestions. Tips and feedback are always welcome!
[/size]
[size=3]

Always needed (without exceptions)

[/size][list][*][size=3][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/][color=#6d9eeb][u]Skyrim Script Extender SKSE Beta build  1.7.2[/u][/color] [color=#ffffff](required by Race Menu)[/color][/url]
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?][color=#6d9eeb][u]RaceMenu v3.0.0[/u][/color][/url]

[/size][/*]
[/list][size=3]


NEEDED for this look (and to prevent purple body texture)

[/size][list][*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?][color=#6d9eeb][size=3][u]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/u][/size][/color][/url][/*]
[*][color=#6d9eeb][size=3][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36425/?]Real Girls Realistic Body Texture by Zonzai and Seren4XX[/url] 
[/u][/size][/color][/*]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49279/?][color=#6d9eeb][size=3][u]Northborn Scars  by Northborn[/u][/size][/color][/url][/*]
[/list][list][*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49069/?][color=#6d9eeb][size=3][u]Improved Eyes Skyrim by missjennabee[/u][/size][/color][/url][/*]
[*][color=#6d9eeb][size=3][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841/?]Freckle Mania  by tetrodoxin[/url]
[/u][/size][/color][/*]
[*][color=#6d9eeb][size=3][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61777/?]The Coenaculi - RaceMenu Plugin for Tattoos by Desufire[/url]
[/u][/size][/color][/*]
[*][color=#6d9eeb][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50032/?][u]KJ Tattoos by Khajiitas[/u][/url]
[/size][/color][/*]
[/list][size=3]
+ Hair - Ks Hairdos265

[color=#6fa8dc]
[/color] Gear (not needed but HIGHLY RECOMMENDED to keep all concept look, wothout it she'll be just a tall girl with brown hair):

[/size][list][*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14205/?][u]Calyps Animal Ears[/u][/url] by calyps  for Wolf Ears[/size][/*]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27997/?][u]Werewolf Tail and Ears[/u][/url] by Loshirai14 for fluffy tail[/size][/*]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30466/?][u]Hunting Grounds Outfit[/u][/url] by Nimezis HIGHLY RECOMMENDED, because it's tailored for Werewolfs! Read HGO description carefully ;) Nimezis done wonderful work there!
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27064/?][u]KDCirclets Redone[/u][/url] by zzjay
[/size][/*]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36127/?][size=3][u]Longclaw by ImsumDave[/u][/size][u]
[/u][/url][u][color=#f9cb9c][size=2][/size][/color][/u]
[/*]
[/list][size=2]
This is my first file/preset ever so please be gentle :D



[/size]
author: Sho

files.name: Lykaia SRG textures with better looking lips
